name: aileen
cooked: The Open Source Hardware Association is taking input on the proposal for an open hardware certification in this forum. This thread is devoted to question # 6, which reads: “Should certification require fees? If so, should those fees take into account the size of the person/company behind the project, the commercial nature of the product, and/or the number of units sold?” For other question forums, as well as a general comment forum, click [here].
raw: The Open Source Hardware Association is taking input on the proposal for an open hardware certification in this forum. This thread is devoted to question # 6, which reads: "Should certification require fees? If so, should those fees take into account the size of the person/company behind the project, the commercial nature of the product, and/or the number of units sold?" For other question forums, as well as a general comment forum, click [here].
